page.title: 03Junction of two Main roads
page.content: At the North West of our survey area are two main roads. They are the Birmingham New Rd & the Parkfield Rd. The Birmingham New Road is being made wider. There are not many Pelican crossings so it is dangerous to cross the main road. There are many traffic lights along its length so there are not many crashes. In the morning and evening these main roads are very busy. There are lots of small side roads in the vicinity and sometimes these get busy as well, as people take short cuts. I live on the Birmingham New Road. It is very busy and noisy and when the cars are at the filling station you can smell the petrol. I think that there should be more pelican crossings making it easier for people like me to cross.
